projects.name: Coloc-Link
projects.description: Conceptualized and launched 'Coloc,' an innovative platform tailored for university students, facilitating seamless flatmates searches within college communities while fostering a sense of belonging and camaraderie. Implemented innovative features resulting in a 30% increase in successful roommate matches among college students, significantly enhancing their living experience. Leveraged advanced algorithms to match students with suitable living arrangements, optimizing their college experience and promoting academic success.

projects.name: Ani-Link
projects.description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly web page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase animated shows. Ensured the web page adapts seamlessly across various devices, providing a consistent user experience on desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Created an intuitive and visually appealing interface focused on easy navigation and user engagement.

experiences.description: Successfully developed and deployed a web application with notable improvements in performance and user experience. Achieved significant reductions in page load times, leading to a smoother browsing experience and increased user satisfaction. Enhanced engagement and retention rates through optimized performance and streamlined user interactions.

full_output.name: LOVE DHAMA
publications: Ms. Bhumica Verma, Harsh Ahuja, Muskan Jain, Hirnaymay Bhaskar, Love Dhama, Coloc-College Off-Campus Accommodation Finder, Accepted and Published in IJFMR International Journal for Multidisciplinary Research Volume 6, Issue 3, 5-7 June 2024.
